job.body:
Total Vacancies: various

Name of the Vacancies:

  • Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test

Description

The latest central Government job for Nurses has been published by School Education Dept for Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test vacancies in Karnataka. If you are searching for a government job in Karnataka then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies on the Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test, from 01-07-2021, and till 20-07-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in Karnataka and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • No information about the application fee

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for a Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test in TET, your B.A/ B.Sc  must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 01-07-2021
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 20-07-2021

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 35 years old. 

TET Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for TET Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test 2021? 

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the Karnataka Teacher Eligibility Test. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of TET and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by TET
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.

Download Official notification pdf.
